overview:
As the founder and visionary for Mindbloom, Chris oversees the strategic alignment of the company’s mission and its products. Prior to founding Mindbloom, Chris was the Executive Producer at Monolith Productions, a top industry leader in high-end, cinematic, 3D game development. During his decade of success at Monolith, his most notable achievements include the productions of multi-million-dollar, award winning blockbusters such as “F.E.A.R.,” “Tron 2.0,” “Aliens vs. Predator 2,” and “No One Lives Forever.”

Chris graduated Magna Cum Laude in 1994 from University of Washington with a B.S. Degree in Mechanical Engineering.
